name: Dicyclomine Hydrochloride

ingredients.name: SODIUM STARCH GLYCOLATE TYPE A POTATO

indications: Dicyclomine hydrochloride is indicated for the treatment of patients with functional bowel/irritable bowel syndrome.
contraindications: Dosage must be adjusted to individual patient needs.
warningsAndPrecautions:
Dicyclomine hydrochloride tablets, USP, 20 mg is supplied as follows:
                  Light blue to blue round tablet with a few white spots and "T 200" engraved on one side, supplied in bottles;
                  To prevent fading, avoid exposure to direct sunlight. Store at 20°-25℃ (68°-77°F). [See USP controlled room temperature].
                  
                     Bottles of 20 Tablets	NDC 68788-8540-2
                  Bottles of 30 Tablets	NDC 68788-8540-3
                  Bottles of 60 Tablets	NDC 68788-8540-6
                  Bottles of 90 Tablets	NDC 68788-8540-9
